00030 import gettext
00031 from PyQt4.QtCore import *
00032 from PyQt4.QtGui import *
00033 from PyQt4.uic import *
00034 
00035 from Koo import Rpc
00036 
00037 from Koo.Common import Common
00038 import copy
00039 
00040 from Koo.Screen.Screen import Screen
00041 from Koo.Model.Group import RecordGroup
00042 
00043 (PreferencesDialogUi, PreferencesDialogBase) = loadUiType( Common.uiPath('preferences.ui') )
00044 
00045 class PreferencesDialog(QDialog, PreferencesDialogUi):
00046         def __init__(self, parent=None):
00047                 QDialog.__init__(self, parent)
00048                 PreferencesDialogUi.__init__(self)
00049                 self.setupUi( self )
00050 
00051                 self.connect( self.pushAccept, SIGNAL('clicked()'), self.slotAccept )
00052 
00053                 actionId = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', 'res.users', 'action_get', {})
00054                 action = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', 'ir.actions.act_window', 'read', [actionId], False, Rpc.session.context)[0]
00055 
00056                 viewIds=[]
00057                 if action.get('views', []):
00058                         viewIds=[x[0] for x in action['views']]
00059                 elif action.get('view_id', False):
00060                         viewIds=[action['view_id'][0]]
00061 
00062                 self.group = RecordGroup('res.users')
00063                 self.group.load( [Rpc.session.uid] )
00064                 self.screen.setRecordGroup( self.group )
00065                 self.screen.setupViews( ['form'], [viewIds[0]] )
00066                 self.screen.display( Rpc.session.uid )
00067 
00068                 # Set minimum and maximum dialog size
00069                 size = self.screen.sizeHint()
00070                 self.setMinimumSize( size.width()+100, min(600, size.height()+25) )
00071                 desktop = QDesktopWidget()
00072                 size = desktop.availableGeometry( self ).size()
00073                 size -= QSize( 50, 50 )
00074                 self.setMaximumSize( size )
00075 
00076                 self.setWindowTitle( _('User Preferences') )
00077 
00078         def slotAccept(self):
00079                 if not self.screen.currentRecord().validate():
00080                         return
00081 
00082                 Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', 'res.users', 'write', [Rpc.session.uid], self.screen.get())
00083                 Rpc.session.reloadContext()
00084                 self.accept()
